item.title: HipChat Notifications
item.description: Send a notification to a HipChat room when an event occurs on your Metricly Policies. HipChat notifications are re-usable across multiple policies. Read below for configuration steps. Configuration 1. Generate a room token Log in to your Hipchat account. Navigate to the Rooms section. Under My Rooms, select or create the desired room. On the left panel, select Tokens. Type a Label for the room and select Send Notification from the scopes list.
